mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SI_NO, CASE WHEN SI_NAME LIKE '%남도%' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(SI_NAME, 1, 2), '도') WHEN SI_NAME LIKE '%북도%' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(SI_NAME, 1, 2), '도') ELSE SUBSTRING(SI_NAME, 1, 2) END AS SI_NAME FROM REGION
SELECT T1.THEME_NO, T1.THEME_NAME, T1.THEME_PARENT_NO, T2.THEME_NAME AS PARENT_NAME FROM THEME T1 INNER JOIN THEME T2 ON T1.THEME_PARENT_NO = T2.THEME_NO
SELECT R.*, U.USER_FIRSTNAME, U.USER_LASTNAME FROM REVIEWS R INNER JOIN USERS U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE TOUR_NO = #{tourNo}
SELECT DISTINCT SI_NAME FROM REGION
SELECT DISTINCT GU_NAME FROM REGION WHERE SI_NAME = #{siName} AND GU_NAME IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM THEME WHERE THEME_NO IN (100, 200, 300, 400, 500)
SELECT T2.THEME_NAME FROM THEME T1 INNER JOIN THEME T2 ON T1.THEME_NO = T2.THEME_PARENT_NO WHERE T2.THEME_PARENT_NO = ( SELECT THEME_NO FROM THEME WHERE THEME_NAME = #{themeParent} )
SELECT DISTINCT SI_NAME FROM REGION WHERE SI_NO = #{siNo}
SELECT DISTINCT GU_NAME FROM REGION WHERE SI_NO = #{siNo} AND GU_NO = #{guNo}
SELECT THEME_NAME FROM THEME WHERE THEME_NO = #{themeParentNo}
SELECT THEME_NAME FROM THEME WHERE THEME_NO = #{themeNo}
SELECT * FROM REGION WHERE SI_NO = #{siNo} AND GU_NO IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT SI_NAME, SI_NO FROM REGION
SELECT DISTINCT SI FROM AREA
SELECT DISTINCT GU FROM AREA WHERE SI = #{si} AND GU IS NOT NULL
SELECT DONG FROM AREA WHERE SI = #{si} AND GU = #{gu} AND DONG IS NOT NULL
SELECT NX, NY FROM AREA WHERE SI = #{si} AND GU = #{gu} AND DONG = #{dong}
SELECT * FROM IMG WHERE TOUR_NO = #{tourNo} AND THUMBNAIL = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM REGION R INNER JOIN RIG_WEATHER W ON R.SI_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', W.SI_NAME, '%') OR R.GU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', W.SI_NAME, '%') WHERE R.SI_NAME = #{si} AND R.GU_NAME = #{gu}
SELECT * FROM ALARM WHERE TARGET_USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY AL_CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT 10
